entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 March 2023
